typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Customer ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		Surname as string,
		Gender as string,
		Age as string,
		Region as string,
		{Job Classification} as string,
		{Date Joined} as string,
		Balance as string,
		CompleteName as string,
		Day as string,
		Month as string,
		Year as string,
		MonthName as string,
		Duplicates as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sort(asc({Customer ID}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 split(Gender=="Male",
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Male, Female)
ConditionalSplit1@Male sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustID as integer,
		CustName as string,
		CustSurn as string,
		Age as string,
		Region as string,
		Jobclass as string,
		Datejoined as string,
		Balance as double,
		CompleteName as string,
		vDay as integer,
		vMonth as integer,
		vYear as integer,
		vNamemonth as string,
		vStatus as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustID = {Customer ID},
		CustName = Name,
		CustSurn = Surname,
		Age,
		Region,
		Jobclass = Region,
		Datejoined = {Job Classification},
		Balance = {Date Joined},
		CompleteName,
		vDay = Day,
		vMonth = Month,
		vYear = Year,
		vNamemonth = MonthName,
		vStatus = Duplicates
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Female sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustID as integer,
		CustName as string,
		CustSurn as string,
		Age as string,
		Region as string,
		Jobclass as string,
		Datejoined as string,
		Balance as double,
		CompleteName as string,
		vDay as integer,
		vMonth as integer,
		vYear as integer,
		vNamemonth as string,
		vStatus as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustID = {Customer ID},
		CustName = Name,
		CustSurn = Surname,
		Age,
		Region,
		Jobclass = {Job Classification},
		Datejoined = {Date Joined},
		Balance,
		CompleteName,
		vDay = Day,
		vMonth = Month,
		vYear = Year,
		vNamemonth = MonthName,
		vStatus = Duplicates
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
